story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a young professional who's been navigating the world of customer service and retail while pursuing an innovative educational path. Currently enrolled in a special program at Washtenaw Technical Middle College, they're simultaneously completing high school and working toward an associate's degree – a testament to their ambition and time management skills.

Their professional journey began as a Sales Associate in late 2012, where they cut their teeth in retail, learning to greet customers warmly and make personalized recommendations. This experience laid the groundwork for their next adventure as a Barista in early 2013, where they mastered the art of crafting beverages and maintaining a fast-paced food service environment. They didn't just make drinks – they became proficient in food safety, operating POS systems, and juggling multiple tasks while maintaining a spotless work area.

From there, they moved into another Sales Associate position, where they honed their retail expertise. They became skilled at computing sales, processing various forms of payment, and helping customers find their perfect style. Their ability to explain product features and influence buying decisions made them a valuable team member.

Later in 2014, they took on a role as a Crew Member, where they showcased their versatility by managing drive-through operations, preparing food with precision, and maintaining high standards of customer service during rush hours. Their attention to detail and commitment to food safety never wavered, even during the busiest shifts.

Beyond their professional experience, they've demonstrated a commitment to community service, volunteering their time for landscape work at Springhill, helping at the Livingston Human Society, and participating in a mission trip to a Native American reservation where they worked with children.

Their skill set spans from technical abilities like MS Office and POS systems to soft skills such as excellent communication and organizational capabilities. This combination of education, work experience, and community involvement shows a well-rounded individual who's ready to take on new challenges while continuing to grow professionally.
